original_title: Muse: BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge Special
overview: Muse were at Maida Vale for a Live Lounge Special and they performed half an hour set including ‘Dead Inside’, ‘Supermassive Black Hole’, ‘Mercy’ and ‘Knights Of Cydonia’ and a cover of CHVRCHES’ ‘Lies’.  A small audience was also present in the studio.  The Manson M1D1 Stealth was used for the first time.
title: Muse: BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge Special
